job.name: Imap_Email_Fetcher

variable.description: The SMTP port. Default value is 993
variable.name: PORT

variable.description: If true, enable the encryption of email communications using the TLS protocol
variable.name: STARTTLS_ENABLE

variable.description: Specify the folder you want to access in the mailbox. For example, "INBOX" or "[Gmail]/Sent Mail" or any other label.
variable.name: EMAIL_FOLDER_NAME

variable.description: If true, fetch the email content and save it in a html file.
variable.name: FETCH_EMAIL_CONTENT

variable.description: A comma-separated string specifying the indices of emails to fetch. Leave empty to fetch all emails.
variable.name: EMAIL_INDEXES

variable.description: Relative path of a folder inside the USER Data Space in which the attachment files will be saved. The provided path can be either a path to a folder terminated by / or an empty value for the root (e.g. attachments/.
variable.name: DROP_FOLDER_PATH

variable.description: If true, the fetched emails will be deleted.
variable.name: ENABLE_EMAIL_DELETION

job.description: A workflow that accesses a specified mailbox folder, retrieves the email content and attachments for the given indexes, and saves them to a designated drop folder. This workflow can also be configured to automatically delete the processed emails.

task.name: Imap_Email_Fetcher
